name: homeotherm
content:

a homeothermic animal (= one able to keep its body temperature at the same level despite changes in the temperature around it): You are a homeotherm, just like your dog, a tiger, or an elephant. Whales, dolphins, seals, and other marine mammals are homeotherms. See
homeothermic
More examplesFewer examplesA newborn infant is a homeotherm, but over a long period of time, cannot maintain the thermal processes. I'd like to celebrate being a warm-blooded homeotherm by visiting the Hall of Mammals at the Museum of Natural History.Big crocodiles are homeotherms which can keep a stable body temperature once warm.
